definition: (of children, parents etc) at one's side/living with one
the front (of)/(in) front/(in) sb's presence/just before (a date)
heel/to follow closely/to go with/(of a woman) to marry sb/with/compared with/to/towards/and (joining two nouns)
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: Butterfly flew closer to her to ask to be his bride.
sentences.chinese: 蝴蝶飛到她跟前要她做他的新娘。

sentences.english: The lake lies low by the hill, a tearful entreaty of love at the foot of the inflexible.
sentences.chinese: 湖躺在山腳下，像在執拗者的跟前含淚懇求愛。

sentences.english: He starts talking to people at the table, away from me.
sentences.chinese: 他開始和桌子跟前的人們說話，離開了我。

sentences.english: He breezed up to the police officer and asked for directions.
sentences.chinese: 他信步走到警官跟前問路。

sentences.english: Cossack got off his horse, lifted the boy down, and came with him to Denisov.
sentences.chinese: 那個哥薩克把孩子抱下馬，把他帶到傑尼索夫跟前。

sentences.english: But, uplifting my eyes, I saw that Berenice stood before me.
sentences.chinese: 可當我擡起眼睛，我看見貝蕾妮絲站在我跟前。

sentences.english: Giovanni shouted as soon as he reached her.
sentences.chinese: 喬凡尼一到她的跟前便大聲喊道。

sentences.english: Many more exhausted their last breath just as they reached the abatis.
sentences.chinese: 更多的人衝到鹿砦跟前已耗盡最後一絲氣力。

sentences.english: One day in spring, Wang Liangbin called his servant to him.
sentences.chinese: 春天裏的一天，王亮賓把他的家丁叫到跟前。

sentences.english: You too must come to Him no matter what it costs you.
sentences.chinese: 無論要付上多大代價，你也必須來到祂跟前。

sentences.english: May she not go in unto her King at every hour?
sentences.chinese: 她可以每時每刻到王的跟前。

sentences.english: He followed the sounds and came upon the busy Carpenters.
sentences.chinese: 它循聲來到正在忙碌的木匠們跟前。

sentences.english: Shouted the old black females was such a big deal, the front of the neighbors were awakened.
sentences.chinese: 老黑母兔這麼一喊不要緊，把跟前的鄰居們都驚醒了。

sentences.english: They grab Jake and haul him to his feet.
sentences.chinese: 他們抓住傑克，把他拖到跟前。

sentences.english: The house is not accessible by motor-car.
sentences.chinese: 這所房子汽車開不到跟前。

sentences.english: They bound him, holding him before Ea.
sentences.chinese: 於是他們將他捆綁起來，押送到Ea跟前。

definition: to come close/to get near to/front
to reach out with one's hand/to hold out a hand/(fig.) to beg/to get involved/to meddle
